# AUDIO::SET_VEHICLE_RADIO_ENABLED

## Summary
Enables/disables radio for a specific vehicle

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** veh
* **BOOL** enabled

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
can't seem to enable radio on cop cars etc
